message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not sure I can meet you at $90. How about we compromise at $110?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go as low as $100?
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob. I can do $105, but I'm not sure I can go any lower. How about we meet at $105?
